Rating: [You decide!] Disks: 44: DESCRiPTiON: Broken Age is a family friendly, hand-animated, puzzle-filled
adventure game with an all-star cast, including Elijah Wood, Jack
Black and Masasa Moyo

Funded by a record breaking crowdfunding campaign and designed by
industry legend Tim Schafer, Broken Age is a timeless
coming-of-age story of barfing trees and talking spoons

Vella Tartine and Shay Volta are two teenagers in strangely
similar situations, but radically different worlds. The player can
freely switch between their stories, helping them take control of
their own lives, and dealing with the unexpected adventures that
follow

Starring:
* Elijah Wood as Shay
* Masasa Moyo as Vella
